results.title: Early-Onset Diabetes Mellitus in Chromosome 8p11.2 Deletion Syndrome Combined With Becker Muscular Dystrophy - A Case Report
results.text_hl: All of the above-involved genes are related to @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ development but do not cause any known monogenic defects in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@. Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ will be the first choice for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_DiGeorge_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004062 @@@8p11.2 deletion syndrome@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Cao C, Wang X, Zhao X. Early-Onset Diabetes Mellitus in Chromosome 8p11.2 Deletion Syndrome Combined With Becker Muscular Dystrophy - A Case Report Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2022;13():914863. PMID: 35957837
